extendedIngredients.name: chicory
extendedIngredients.original: 1 head chicory (curly endive) or other bitter leafy green, chopped
extendedIngredients.originalName: chicory (curly endive) or other bitter leafy green, chopped

extendedIngredients.name: dijon mustard
extendedIngredients.original: 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, smooth or whole-grain

extendedIngredients.name: hazelnuts
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 cup lightly toasted hazelnuts, coarsely chopped

extendedIngredients.name: kosher salt
extendedIngredients.original: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
extendedIngredients.originalName: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

extendedIngredients.name: manchego cheese
extendedIngredients.original: 4 ounces aged Spanish Manchego cheese, shaved

title: Chicory Salad with Blueberries, Hazelnuts, and Aged Manchego
summary: Chicory Salad with Blueberries, Hazelnuts, and Aged Manchego might be a good recipe to expand your side dish collection. This recipe serves 4. Watching your figure? This gluten free and primal recipe has 510 calories, 11g of protein, and 47g of fat per serving. For $2.4 per serving, this recipe covers 22% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A mixture of blueberries, honey, aged manchego cheese, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. This recipe from Foodnetwork has 4 fans. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 87%. This score is super. Similar recipes are kale salad with blueberries, manchego and pumpkin seed clusters, Celery Root Salad With Manchego, Hazelnuts & Dried Cherries, and Breakfast Grain Salad With Blueberries, Hazelnuts & Lemon.
instructions: To prepare the dressing:                          In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the olive oil, vinegar, honey, and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Shake vigorously to mix well.                          Put the chicory in a large salad bowl. Drizzle the dressing over the greens and toss gently with your hands to coat the leaves. Top with hazelnuts, blueberries, and cheese. Serve immediately.

steps.step: In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the olive oil, vinegar, honey, and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Shake vigorously to mix well.
Put the chicory in a large salad bowl.
Drizzle the dressing over the greens and toss gently with your hands to coat the leaves. Top with hazelnuts, blueberries, and cheese.
